HERO.DESCRIPTION: Khmer Kansai Co., Ltd. collects and recycles unwanted appliances, plastics, aluminum, iron, bicycles, construction machinery, and agricultural equipment. We contribute to eco-friendly activities by reusing these resources in Southeast Asia.

MISSION.TITLE: Towards a Sustainable Future
MISSION.SUBTITLE: We aim to reduce environmental impact and realize a circular society for a sustainable future.

RECYCLE.TITLE: Recycling Business
RECYCLE.DESCRIPTION: Collection and recycling of plastics, aluminum, iron, and other metal scraps

BUYING.TITLE: Purchase Business
BUYING.DESCRIPTION: Fair price purchase and recycling of appliances, cars, and leather products

MACHINERY.TITLE: Construction & Agricultural Machinery
MACHINERY.DESCRIPTION: High-value purchase and export agency for construction machinery and agricultural equipment

GLOBAL.TITLE: Global Expansion
GLOBAL.DESCRIPTION: Reuse and sales network in Southeast Asia

CTA.TITLE: Feel Free to Contact Us First
CTA.SUBTITLE: Even items you think are no longer usable may be able to create new value.

MESSAGE.TITLE: Message from the President
MESSAGE.P1: Thank you for visiting the website of Khmer Kansai Co., Ltd.
MESSAGE.P2: We aim to realize a circular society that values resources. Through the collection of unwanted appliances, plastics, aluminum, iron, bicycles, construction machinery, and agricultural equipment, we contribute to reducing environmental impact while supporting our customers' lives through our purchase business and estate clearance services.
MESSAGE.P3: Even items you think can no longer be used may be able to create new value. Rather than simply disposing of waste, we propose the best ways to 'connect to the next' and link to a sustainable future.
MESSAGE.P4: We will continue to walk with the local community, providing environmentally friendly and reliable services. We look forward to your continued support of Khmer Kansai Co., Ltd.

PRIVACY_POLICY.TITLE: Privacy Policy
PRIVACY_POLICY.INTRO: Khmer Kansai Co., Ltd. (hereinafter referred to as 'the Company') recognizes the importance of personal information protection in the services provided on this website, complies with the Act on the Protection of Personal Information, and establishes the following Privacy Policy (hereinafter referred to as 'this Policy').

SECTION1.TITLE: Article 1 (Personal Information)
SECTION1.CONTENT: 'Personal Information' refers to 'personal information' as defined in the Personal Information Protection Act, and is information about a living individual that can identify the specific individual by name, date of birth, address, telephone number, contact information, or other descriptions contained in the information, as well as data related to appearance, fingerprints, voiceprints, and health insurance card insurer numbers that can identify the specific individual from the information alone (personal identification information).

SECTION3.TITLE: Article 3 (Method of Acquiring Personal Information)
SECTION3.CONTENT: The Company may ask for personal information such as name, date of birth, address, telephone number, and email address when users register for use.

SECTION4.TITLE: Article 4 (Purpose of Collecting and Using Personal Information)
PURPOSES: Provision and operation of Company services
Response to inquiries from customers (including identity verification)
Information provision regarding services being used and guidance on other services provided by the Company
Contact regarding maintenance, important notices, etc.
Identification of customers who violate terms of use or use services for fraudulent or unreasonable purposes, and refusal of use
Confirmation and viewing of registered information, changes, deletion, and viewing of usage status
Billing for usage fees for paid services
Purposes incidental to the above purposes of use

SECTION5.TITLE: Article 5 (Security Measures for Personal Information)
SECTION5.CONTENT: To protect personal information, the Company takes measures such as management of personal information, designation of methods for carrying out personal information, and prevention of unauthorized access from third parties based on regulations regarding information security, and strives to prevent leakage, loss, falsification, and destruction of personal information.

SECTION6.TITLE: Article 6 (Disclosure of Personal Information)
SECTION6.CONTENT: When requested by the individual to disclose personal information and records of provision to third parties, the Company will disclose this to the individual without delay.

SECTION7.TITLE: Article 7 (Correction and Deletion of Personal Information)
SECTION7.CONTENT: If the personal information held by the Company is incorrect, the customer can request correction, addition, or deletion (hereinafter referred to as 'correction, etc.') of the personal information according to procedures established by the Company.

SECTION8.TITLE: Article 8 (Contact for Inquiries)
SECTION8.CONTENT: For questions, uncertainties, complaints, and other inquiries regarding the handling of personal information by the Company, please contact the following:

SCRAP.TITLE: Scrap Metal & Materials Trading
SCRAP.DESCRIPTION: We specialize in buying and selling various scrap metals and recyclable materials. From copper wires to aluminum sheets, we offer competitive prices and professional handling.

COPPER.TITLE: Copper
COPPER.DESC: Copper wires, pipes, and scrap. High market value.

ALUMINUM.TITLE: Aluminum
ALUMINUM.DESC: Cans, sheets, profiles, and industrial scrap.

IRON.TITLE: Iron & Steel
IRON.DESC: Heavy machinery, structural steel, and mixed scrap.

PLASTIC_RECYCLE.TITLE: Plastic Recycling & Pelletizing
PLASTIC_RECYCLE.DESCRIPTION: We buy old and waste plastic, then process it into high-quality reusable plastic pellets. These pellets serve as raw materials for manufacturing new plastic products.

BUYING.TITLE: We Buy:
BUYING.DESC: PET bottles, HDPE containers, PP products, industrial plastic waste, and mixed plastics.

PROCESS.TITLE: Processing:
PROCESS.DESC: Sorting, cleaning, shredding, melting, and pelletizing into uniform plastic granules.

SELLING.TITLE: We Sell:
SELLING.DESC: High-quality recycled pellets: PET, HDPE, PP, and custom compounds for manufacturing.

MACHINERY.TITLE: Construction & Agricultural Machinery
MACHINERY.DESCRIPTION: We buy and sell construction machinery and agricultural equipment. From excavators to tractors, we handle export to Southeast Asian markets.

EXCAVATORS.TITLE: Excavators
EXCAVATORS.DESC: CAT, Komatsu, Hitachi models. We buy used and refurbished units for export.

TRACTORS.TITLE: Tractors & Combines
TRACTORS.DESC: Agricultural machinery including tractors, harvesters, and tillage equipment.

PARTS.TITLE: Parts & Components
PARTS.DESC: Spare parts, engines, hydraulic components, and attachments.

MACHINERY.QUOTE: Global export to Cambodia, Vietnam, and other Southeast Asian markets.
